title: pbies
author: pbies
created_time: October 11, 2023, 09:43:03 AMLast edit: October 11, 2023, 07:25:18 PM by pbies
content: I have tons of: - addresses - txids - R, S, Z values - pubkeysWhat should I do next to "hack the planet"?I suspect that obtaining k values should be next, but what is the way further?

comments.author: franky1
comments.body: Quote from: pbies on October 11, 2023, 09:43:03 AMI have tons of: - addresses - txids - R, S, Z values - pubkeysWhat should I do next to "hack the planet"?I suspect that obtaining k values should be next, but what is the way further?satoshi re-spent funds from a known key if you cant hack 12cbQLTFMXRnSzktFkuoG3eHoMeFtpTu3S which has 5 signatures to prune data from, https://www.blockchain.com/explorer/transactions/btc/f4184fc596403b9d638783cf57adfe4c75c605f6356fbc91338530e9831e9e16https://www.blockchain.com/explorer/transactions/btc/a16f3ce4dd5deb92d98ef5cf8afeaf0775ebca408f708b2146c4fb42b41e14behttps://www.blockchain.com/explorer/transactions/btc/591e91f809d716912ca1d4a9295e70c3e78bab077683f79350f101da64588073https://www.blockchain.com/explorer/transactions/btc/12b5633bad1f9c167d523ad1aa1947b2732a865bf5414eab2f9e5ae5d5c191bahttps://www.blockchain.com/explorer/transactions/btc/828ef3b079f9c23829c56fe86e85b4a69d9e06e5b54ea597eef5fb3ffef509fe and how hundreds of people over 14 years have failed.. then let it be a lesson that "hacking" bitcoin is not easy.. but again goodluck, please update us in 14 years with your results of your attempts
